short_summary: Bipod System procurement for the Government of Canada
description: This notice is to inform suppliers, vendors, or other external entities about the procurement of a Bipod System by the Government of Canada.
full_summary:
**BIPOD SYSTEM**

### Notification Reference: cb-173-61988364

#### Request for Proposal
The government of Canada invites bids for the procurement of 244 Bipod Systems to be delivered to Montreal, Quebec.

#### Key Information:

*   Solicitation Number: W8476-246751/A
*   Amendment Number: 9
*   Publication Date: 2023-12-07
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-26 at 2:00PM EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-19
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2024-05-20
*   Procurement Category: Goods
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Options and Specifications:

*   The Contracting Authority may exercise option quantities within 36 months after contract award date.
*   The detailed requirement is specified in the Annex B-Technical Purchase Description.

#### Contact Information:

*   Christopher Fry
*   Email: [Christopher.fry2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Christopher.fry2@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (000) 000-0000

#### Documents:

*   Tender Notice and Request for Proposal [#W8476-246751/A: BIPOD SYSTEM](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26917/w8476-246751-bipod-system_0.pdf)
*   Request for Proposal Amendment 001, Amendment 002, and Amendment 003
*   Bidder's Workbook (Appendix 1 to Annex C)

Please submit all written enquiries to the Contracting Authority no later than ten (10) calendar days before the bid closing date. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
